name: Heather Riley
text: This is by far my favorite takeout pizza now. The crust is always perfect, and the toppings always taste so fresh. We usually get the Papa's Favorite or Murphy's Combo, regular crust, no recipe mods, family size. You can't beat the price - ‚Ä¶More

text: Fantastic service. DJ really took the time to explain the concept and made excellent suggestions to work around my dietary restrictions.  The pizzas were delicious and his recommendations for size were spot on.

text: Friendly and timely service from the staff. The food is delicious and priced great for the amount and quality of food you take home. Would recommend this, especially if you are trying to eat gluten free as they offer that as a crust option.
